name: The Combatribes
overview: The Big Apple's Gone Rotten - Rival gangs have joined forces and New York City is under siege. Your mission: seek out and destroy their leader - Martha Splatterhead-former member of your elite Combatribe Cyborg unit. But in order to get to this renegade babe you'll have to do some head bashin' with five of the most feared gangs in Gotham... on their turf! - 12 Megabits of joint-jolting action - 5 gruesome gangs - Over 40 different battles moves - 16 gonzo characters - 1 or 2 players in either "VS." or "Mission" mode - Kickin' graphics and thumpin' soundtrack
